My Thinking Process

All of my projects are based off of a step by step process to secure efficient results.

1

Planning

Gathering the requirements for the project such as, finding the purpose of the project, what audience are we targeting and what kind of information will be provided.

2

Design

Gathering the requirements for the project such as, finding the purpose of the project, what audience are we targeting and what kind of information will be provided.

3

Implement

Gathering the requirements for the project such as, finding the purpose of the project, what audience are we targeting and what kind of information will be provided.

4

Testing & Deployment

Gathering the requirements for the project such as, finding the purpose of the project, what audience are we targeting and what kind of information will be provided.

5

Post-Deployment & Maintenance

Gathering the requirements for the project such as, finding the purpose of the project, what audience are we targeting and what kind of information will be provided.
